Note:
WINNING POINT (8-bit)
0x00=1 Point
0x01=2 Points
0x02=3 Points
0x03=4 Points
0x04=5 Points

BitFlags - D-Pad / Buttons - 1P (8-bit)
Bit0=Up
Bit1=Down
Bit2=Left
Bit3=Right
Bit4=X
Bit5=Circle
Bit6=Square
Bit7=Triangle

Bit0=R1
Bit1=R2
Bit2=L1
Bit3=L2
Bit4=Start
Bit5=Select

0x0a = no buttons are pressed
0x00 -> 0x01 -> 0x02 = holding a button (looping)

MOVES (16-bit)
Hitting the opponent, 1P Only
[a little inconsistent]

[ Chizuru Kagura ]
Ichimen 85 Katsu Reigi no Ishizue
0x3ee0 -> 0x3ed0 -> 0x3f58

[ Iori ]
Ura 108 Shiki Ya Sakazuki (SDM) = 0x9858

OPTION - 2P (8-bit)
0x00=Difficulty
0x01=Play Time
0x02=Stage Select
0x03=Demo Cut
0x04=Battle Configuration
0x05=Controller Set
0x06=Sound Set
0x07=Vibration
0x08=Memory Card
0x09=Exit
0x12=Game Start
0x13=Art Gallery
0x14=Option

OPTION - 1P (8-bit)
0x00=Difficulty
0x01=Play Time
0x02=Stage Select
0x03=Demo Cut
0x04=Battle Configuration
0x05=Controller Set
0x06=Sound Set
0x07=Vibration
0x08=Memory Card
0x09=Exit

CONTINUE (8-bit)
0x01 = Continue
0x02 = Game Over
0x03 -> 0x04 = Continue Service

MAIN MENU (8-bit)
0x00=Game Start
0x01=Art Gallery
0x02=Option

After the Opening - Countdown (16-bit)
Demo - Countdown (16-bit)

MAIN MENU - Mode Select (8-bit)
0x00=Team Play
0x01=Team Vs
0x02=Single Play
0x03=Single Vs
0x04=Survivor
0x05=Practice
0x06=Exit

MAIN MENU - Time out (8-bit)
It will trigger the opening

Movement (8-bit)
Bit7 = Special

Practice
Bit0 = Paused

BitFlag - Battle Number (8-bit)
all Bits off = 1st battle
1 Bit on = 2nd battle
any Bit on = +1 battle

BitFlag - Battle Number (8-bit)
all Bits off = 1st battle
1 Bit on = 2nd battle
any Bit on = +1 battle

PRACTICE MENU - (8-bit)
0x00 = Start
0x01 = Action
0x02 = Counter
0x03 = Attack
0x04 = Guard
0x05 = Character Change
0x06 = Exit

GAME MODE (8-bit)
0x01=Team Play
0x03=Team Vs
0x00=Single Play
0x02=Single Vs
0x07=Survivor
0x06=Practice

0x0e = Custom

Bit0 = Max Power Gauge
Bit1 = CPU Starts with 1/3 energy
Bit2 = CPU Level Down 
Bit3 = Skip to the next Match
Bit4  = Power Up!
Bit5 = CPU power off
